channel.title: No password in characters
channel.description:
when i make a new account or when someone makes a new account on my sever it doesnt save there password it gives me a bunch of numbers how do i fix this to where it shows there password
[ACCOUNT] character-username = teh genevoix character-password = 158-157-122-8-224-72-233-214-4-183-148-96-181-73-105-195

item.title: No password in characters
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Remove the password encryption in your playersave class.
